title: Bloomberg Markets: Miaoulis on Importance of STEM Education

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Ioannis Miaoulis President and Director Museum of Science Discussing the making science, technology, engineering and math relatable to students.
